page.title: 16LIFE STYLES STRACATHRO
page.content:
There are no shops in our village so my mum goes to Brechin or Montrose for messages. I have to push the trolley in Fine Fare while mum picks up all the foods like peas,butcher meat,bread,biscuits,marg,cheese,jam, sugar,Mr Kipling cake, not forgetting the sweets. We put all the food on the counter while the till_lady counts it all up. Mum pays for all this with cash.Then we put it all in a box in the boot of the car. Next we collect the newspapers, the Dundee Courier, the Brechin Advertiser and Look_In for me.In the first page it has Cannon and Ball which is a comedy act on television.
Shawn Kenny wrote this.
